moves.1. e4 d5: Miss L. recommended I try this, as a variant. Of course, she didn't tell me what to do after this move,,,
moves.5... e5: Opens a line for the KB...
moves.6... Qe4+: What the hell... may as well...
moves.7. Kf2: Q-K2 was undoubtedly a better move. Of course, I say that with 20 years of hindsight.
moves.7... Ng4+: Natural... and decisive. The only move is 8 QxN, but then BxQ yields a decisive material advantage. T. M. resigns.

gameName: Me and T. M. in a HS freindly
